channel.title: Vertex Buffer Limits
channel.description:
Got message: tell programmer something about Vertex_Buffer_Size? (or something like that.)
Edit: My auto_save file loads right after flipping the second switch at the the second pump in Lambda Complex, crashing the game and giving this error message.
Edit 2: Reloading earlier quick save allowed me to get through that checkpoint in the game,
